description:
Expand you garage with these 3 rusty rat cars!

Raiden RS: This rear engine 80s coupe is hard to beat on twisty tracks and beeing so short makes it also hard to hit!

RebelRat: Finally some strong american muscle with a really good balance of agility and toughness. 

Vandal: Streamlined like a rock, but also as tough as one. This van is a great choice for all events involving a lot of damage.

This DLC pack is also part of the Season Pass.
name: Rusty Rats Car Pack
